I would use the magic wand to grow a massive, nutritious food forest in every major city, providing fresh, healthy food for all residents and reducing the need for transportation and storage of food.
I would use the magic wand to grow a massive coral reef in the ocean, restoring biodiversity and providing a habitat for marine life.
I would use the magic wand to grow a network of green spaces and parks throughout urban areas, providing a natural environment for people to relax and recharge.
I would use the magic wand to grow a massive solar farm in the desert, harnessing the sun's energy to power the world.
I would use the magic wand to grow a network of underwater data centers, using the natural cooling properties of the ocean to keep servers running efficiently and sustainably.
